question: I need the email of the siwes coordinator
answer: The email of the siwes coordinator: izanga@babcock.edu.ng

question: I want to submit my acceptance letter
answer: I'm afraid coach Fola is no longer collecting acceptance letter. But you can try! Send the soft copy to someone who's currently in school and ask them to print and submit it for you. If you plead well enough, coach Fola might collect it.

question: I missed the Friday deadline, couldn't upload my weekly report on the siwes portal website, what can I do?
answer: If you forgot to upload your weekly report on the siwes portal, wait till Monday and try again. Also set an alarm so that you don't forget next week!

question: Am I supposed to add diagrams in my logbook?
answer: Yes. Adding diagrams to your logbook is compulsory. It improves the quality of your work and ensures the completeness of your SIWES experience.

question: Can I submit my SCAF form via email?
answer: Submitting your SCAF form via email is not advisable. Please go to the ITF office closest to your workplace and submit it there.

question: pre-requisite for java cosc 205?
answer: The pre-requisite for COSC 205 Programming in JAVA is COSC 111 Introduction to Computer Science and Programming I.

question: pre-requisite for VB.NET cosc 226?
answer: The pre-requisite for COSC 226 Programming Techniques with VB.NET is COSC 112 Introduction to Computer Science and Programming II.

question: pre-requisite for LINUX ITGY 307?
answer: The pre-requisite for ITGY 307 Linux System Administration is COSC 203 Operating System I.

question: pre-requisite for COSC
answer: The CS course you're enquiring about has no prerequisite that I know of.

answer: The minimum number of weeks for SIWES is 20 weeks.

question: I'm sick so I'm going to be absent from class today, can't come to class.
answer: Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. Kindly inform Tekena (+2348077141863). He's the class exco in charge of keeping records of absenteeism. Please do not call him. Just send a message introducing yourself, stating your reason for absenteeism, and don't forget to attach evidence i.e. BUTH receipt. Take care :)

question: When does 400 lvl level start?
answer: 400 level 1st semester will begin September 3rd, 2024. I'm not aware of the specific date.

question: Can I change my hall after registration after I've registered?
answer: If you've submitted your course form, you'll need to reach out to the student affairs to change your hall. You can call someone from the bursary for more guidance: +234 803 385 5819

question: When do are classes start starting
answer: Classes for 400 lvl first semester commence on September 9th, 2024. Make sure to come early so you don't miss out on early bird free marks and sweet knowledge.

question: When does will main inspection start
answer: Main inspection will start anytime before June 28th, 2024. Just be alert and try reaching out to your supervisor for more info.

question: Please do you have the HOD's secretary's phone number?
